item.title: UPSC CPF Assistant Commandant CAPF Online Form 2025
item.description:
UPSC Combined Central Armed Police Force (Assistant Commandant AC Exam 2025)

Union Public Service Commission

Short Details of Notification UPSC Advt NO. : 09/2025-CAPF

Important Dates

  • Application Begin: 05/03/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 25/03/2025 Upto 06:00 PM Only
  • Last Date Fee Payment: 25/03/2025
  • Correction Date: 26/03/2025 to 01/04/2025
  • Exam Date: 03/08/2025
  • Admit Card Available: Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / OBC: 200/-
  • SC / ST: 0/- (Nil)
  • All Category Female: 0/- (Exempted)

  • Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking in State Bank of India or E Challan Fee Mode

Eligibility

  • Age Limit as on 01/08/2025

  • Minimum Age: 20 Years
  • Maximum Age: 25 Years

Age relaxation as per rules of UPSC Advt NO. : 09/2025-CAPF.

item.title: UPSC Civil Services IAS / IFS Pre Online Form 2025
item.description: Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) Civil Services and Forest Service Examination 2025. Those candidates who are interested in this UPSC IAS / IFS Pre recruitment can Apply Online from 22/01/2025 to 11/02/2025.

item.title: UPSC IAS IFS 2024
item.description: Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) Civil Services and Forest Service Examination 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this UPSC IAS / IFS Pre recruitment can Download Pre Result, Mains Admit Card. Read the notification for recruitment eligibility, post information, selection procedure, age limit, pay scale and all other information.
